ConnectionString.description: Gets or sets the connection string used to connect to the OpenAI service.

ServiceUri.description:
A T:System.Uri referencing the Azure OpenAI Endpoint.
This is likely to be similar to "https://{account_name}.openai.azure.com".

Tracing.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the OpenTelemetry tracing is enabled or not.

UseAzureOpenAI.description: Gets or sets whether to use Azure OpenAI or OpenAI.

OpenAI.description: The settings relevant to accessing Azure OpenAI or OpenAI.
